Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: A group of people are advocating for a new vision for Macquarie Point in Tasmania in order to deter the government from building a stadium which the State Labor Party is firmly against. In addition the Reserve Bank of Australia is undergoing a significant restructuring but experts warn that borrowers should not assume this will result in the end of interest rate increases. Ultimately both groups of people are lobbying for their priorities in the face of opposition.
